channel.title: How can you change a servers welcome text?
channel.description: How can you change a servers welcome text? Like if it says Welcome to Deltascape or if it says 12345678910@smforfree2.com whenever you 1st log in?:confused:

item.title: How can you change a servers welcome text?
item.dc:creator: @ash20o8 ash20o8
item.description:
@ash20o8 wrote:

u wana change like welcome to deltascape.

goto client.java and search welcome to deltascape.
then change it and keep adding SM" vote on…

sumthink like that i hoped i helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How can you change a servers welcome text?

item.title: How can you change a servers welcome text?
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

press Crtl & F at the same time. type in

sM("welcome to

and press search… change what ever text gets highlighted. If your not using deltascape use

sendMessage("welcome to

Read full topic
